tree.name: Jaylen Brown
tree.note: 2024 NBA Finals MVP, 3x All-Star. Drafted from California.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2016 #3 Pick (from BKN)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: The infamous Nets trade: KG, Pierce, Terry for multiple unprotected picks
assetsGivenUp.note: One of the most lopsided trades in NBA history. Pick conveyed as #3 in 2016.

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Garnett
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics acquire KG for Al Jefferson, Ryan Gomes, Gerald Green, Sebastian Telfair, Theo Ratliff, 2009 1st

assetsGivenUp.name: Al Jefferson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Gerald Green
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: High school to NBA, dunk contest winner. TRUE ORIGIN.

assetsGivenUp.name: Ryan Gomes
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Sebastian Telfair
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Portland for Raef LaFrentz

assetsGivenUp.name: Raef LaFrentz
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Dallas for Antoine Walker and Tony Delk

assetsGivenUp.name: Antoine Walker
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: 3x All-Star, Celtics finished 33-49 in 1995-96. TRUE ORIGIN.

assetsGivenUp.name: Tony Delk
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Phoenix for Rodney Rogers

assetsGivenUp.name: Rodney Rogers
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as unrestricted free agent from LAC
assetsGivenUp.note: Free agent signing - no assets given up. TRUE ORIGIN.

assetsGivenUp.name: Theo Ratliff
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Portland in multi-team trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Expiring contract used as salary filler. Treated as origin.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2009 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Pick conveyed #11 to Minnesota, used on Jonny Flynn

assetsGivenUp.name: Paul Pierce
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: The Truth - 2008 Finals MVP, 10x All-Star. Celtics finished 36-46 in 1997-98. TRUE ORIGIN.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jason Terry
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as unrestricted free agent from DAL
assetsGivenUp.note: The Jet - 2011 NBA Champion with Dallas. Signed 3yr/$15M deal. TRUE ORIGIN.
